attributes.action: Move The BBC Radio Four program  Woman's Hour to the World Service
attributes.additional_details: Woman's Hour  has shown that womanpower can smash glass ceilings, shift supermarket porn and change the face of currency. Now females outstrip males academically, power ahead in the workplace, in sport and the arts and rule the roost in most homes. So, battle won the zealous BBC production team must be seconded  to carry the fight beyond via the World Service. Their crusader zeal will be warmly welcomed  in Africa and the Muslim world, burkas will be tossed, or not, as the mood takes and males with insurgency issues may well be constrained by emancipated spouses, especially polygamous ones, thus adding a security imperative.
